mapper.select: SELECT a.SEACH_SEQ, a.TYPE, a.AREAA, a.AREAB, a.AREAC, a.SILVERNAME, a.SERVICE, a.GRADE, a.LAUITUDE, a.LONGITUDE, b.JO_SEQ, b.USERID, b.JO_TYPE, b.JO_DETAILTYPE, b.JO_JOB, b.JO_CONTENT, b.JO_DATE, b.JO_GENDER, b.JO_INT FROM SILVERSEARCH a, JOBOFFER b WHERE a.SEACH_SEQ = b.SEACH_SEQ ORDER BY b.JO_DATE
SELECT COUNT(a.SEACH_SEQ) FROM SILVERSEARCH a, JOBOFFER b WHERE a.SEACH_SEQ = b.SEACH_SEQ

SELECT a.SEACH_SEQ, a.TYPE, a.AREAA, a.AREAB, a.AREAC, a.SILVERNAME, a.SERVICE, a.GRADE, a.LAUITUDE, a.LONGITUDE, b.JO_SEQ, b.USERID, b.JO_TYPE, b.JO_DETAILTYPE, b.JO_JOB, b.JO_CONTENT, b.JO_DATE, b.JO_GENDER, b.JO_INT FROM SILVERSEARCH a, JOBOFFER b WHERE a.SEACH_SEQ = b.SEACH_SEQ AND a.SILVERNAME LIKE '%'||#{silvername}||'%' OR a.SEACH_SEQ = b.SEACH_SEQ AND a.AREAA LIKE '%'||#{areaa}||'%' OR a.SEACH_SEQ = b.SEACH_SEQ AND a.AREAB LIKE '%'||#{areab}||'%' OR a.SEACH_SEQ = b.SEACH_SEQ AND a.AREAC LIKE '%'||#{areac}||'%'
ORDER BY b.JO_DATE
